scripts.build: browserify -e userscript.js -p tinyify -o dist/userscript.min.js && cat tampermonkey-comment.js >> dist/userscript.min.js
scripts.build2: browserify -e search.userscript.js -p tinyify -o dist/search.userscript.min.js && cat tampermonkey-comment.js >> dist/search.userscript.min.js
scripts.build-copy: npm run build && cat dist/userscript.min.js | pbcopy
scripts.build2-copy: npm run build2 && cat dist/search.userscript.min.js | pbcopy
